step-0.name: BAD STEP
step-0.help-1-title: ERROR: I shouldn't be in this step
step-0.help-1-descr: ERROR: I shouldn't be in this step

step-2.name: Schema matching
step-2.help-1-title: Match types in the source fields with types in the target entity type
step-2.help-2-title: You can preview the data in the left area of the screen
step-2.help-3-title: When done, click NEXT to proceed to Data Validation step

step-3.name: Data validation
step-3.help-1-title: Columns with a red title require attention
step-3.help-1-descr: Columns with a red title and a progress bar contain an amount of of cells not respecting the column type indicated by the progress bar
step-3.help-2-title: Each cell content must respect its column type
step-3.help-2-descr: When values respect the type indicated in their column they are displayed in green, otherwise they are displayed in black
step-3.help-3-title: When done, click NEXT to go to the enrichment step

step-4.name: Enrichment
step-4.help-1-descr: In columns with a red title, for relational attiributes select Reconcile->Start reconciling from the column menu to link names in the cells to entities
step-4.help-2-descr: In columns of type SemantifiedText with a red title, select Perform NLP from the column menu to enrich the text
step-4.help-3-title: When all bars are green, click NEXT
step-4.help-3-descr: By clicking NEXT you will proceed to the Reconciliation (at row level) step.

step-5.name: Reconciliation
step-5.help-1-title: Assign to each row a unique id in the first column
step-5.help-2-title: Create new entities or update existing ones
step-5.help-3-title: Click NEXT button to proceed to Export step

step-5-automatic-reconcile.help-2-title: Choose the service to link rows to entities
step-5-automatic-reconcile.help-3-title: Choose on which attributes perform the search
step-5-automatic-reconcile.help-4-title: Click RECONCILE to start horizontal reconciciliation

step-6.name: Exporting
step-6.help-2-title: Download the RDF version of the dataset
step-6.help-3-title: Click NEXT button to proceed to Publish step

step-7.name: Publishing
step-7.help-1-title: A new RDF dataset resource will be now created on CKAN
step-7.help-2-title: Enter the metadata values to associate to the resource on CKAN
step-7.help-4-title: Clic NEXT to proceed to visualization step
